Greatest Ruler

The greatest king of the Vishnukundina dynasty. He performed 11 Ashwamedha sacrifices and 1000 other Vedic sacrifices (like Vajapeya).

тЪФя╕П
Expansion and Diplomacy

He married a Vakataka princess (daughter of Prithvishena II). He expanded his empire by crossing the Godavari river up to Kalinga.

ЁЯЫХ
Cave Temples

The cave temples of Mogalrajapuram and Undavalli near Vijayawada were likely built during his reign.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Trivarna-nagara-bhavana-gata-sundari-hridaya-nandana (One who delights the hearts of beautiful women in three cities).
  • Justice: Famous for his dedication to justice (gave capital punishment to his own son).
